snippet: Michael C. Woodford, the ousted chief of Olympus, said on Friday that he would halt his three-month battle to replace the management of the scandal-tainted Japanese company.
abstract: Michael C. Woodford, the ousted chief of Olympus, says he will halt his three-month battle to replace the management of the scandal-tainted Japanese company.
lead_paragraph: Michael C. Woodford, the ousted chief of Olympus, said on Friday that he would halt his three-month battle to replace the management of the scandal-tainted Japanese company.

headline.seo: Former Olympus Chief Ends Bid to Replace Management
headline.main: Former Chief Ends a Bid for Overhaul at Olympus
headline.print_headline: Former Chief Ends a Bid For Overhaul At Olympus
